item.title: Boston Architectural College
item.description: The BAC is an independent spatial design college offering accredited graduate and undergraduate degrees in architecture, interior architecture, landscape architecture, and design studies. Located in the heart of Bostonâs historic Back Bay, the BACâs central location and close ties to Bostonâs vibrant design community make it a strategic place to study design. The BAC strives to make an excellent design education accessible and stresses professional development by engaging students in real-world practice and academic study concurrently. Our faculty are practicing professionals currently in their fields, and our graduates are accomplished designers with impressive resumes, portfolios, and professional networks.
